title: Dust and Moonlight
description: *Time Travel/Fantasy RomanceWhile investigating the deaths of four young women, Criminal Profiler, Kira Barton, finds herself trapped in an abandoned building by their serial killer. Before the Scarlet Angel strikes his death blow, an ethereal woman from another realm descends from above to save Kira.Transported to another time and place, Kira is now running for her life from wild boars, shape-shifting panthers, masked assassins…and a decadent prince named Balion. Together, Kira and Balion battle an army of Umargo’s hardened warriors bent on destroying the kingdom of Locke Cress.The Prince and the strange woman from another land must also fight the all-consuming passion between them. . .a love that transcends time and crosses all boundaries?
author: Keta Diablo
